anime.description: * Based on Touken Ranbu, collectible card browser video game by http://anidb.net/cr1354 [Nitroplus] and DMM Games. In the year 2205, the past becomes threatened by the historical revisionists who seek to change it. Protecting history becomes the task of a boisterous band of swords that are brought to life, including the glamorous Kashu Kiyomitsu and the kindly Yamatonokami Yasusada. Beyond their battles, these legendary swords from different eras lead charming daily lives. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: bishounen
tag.description: Young man whose beauty (and sexual appeal) transcends the boundary of gender or sexual orientation.

tag.name: fetishes
tag.description: Everything under fetishes (except for Bishounen and Juujin) is strictly only meant for hentai (18 Restricted) and ecchi anime. In case of ecchi, it must be the main element of the show and not when there`s only some of it, for example, there`s some ecchi in Shinseiki Evangelion, but the fact you get to see Asuka`s pantsu doesn`t warrant it the schoolgirl fetish category. So be careful to which ecchi show you add fetishes; it`s fairly straightforward with hentai, though. Overall, this category tree is to satisfy the needs of people with different fetishes, so they can search for what tingles their tangle; hence why this is restricted to hentai and full ecchi shows.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: time travel
tag.description: In time travel anime characters are transported through time either figuratively or literally to find themselves either in the past or the future

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 卯月 この本丸の仲間だからだ
April: Because You`re Our Comrade in This Citadel
4월 : 이 혼마루의 동료니까
Uzuki: Kono Honmaru no Nakama Dakara Da
episode.summary: Fudou Yukimitsu, who once belonged to Oda Nobunaga, can`t seem to get along with those at the citadel... And then another new sword, Kogarasumaru, appears and joins their cherry blossom viewing party. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 弥生 絶対負けねーッ!
March: I Will Not Lose
3월 : 절대로 질 수 없어!
Yayoi: Zettai Makenee!
episode.summary: Mikazuki and Kogitsunemaru are relaxing and drinking tea when Gokotai`s tigers pay a visit, and newly-arrived Taikogane Sadamune teams up with Shokudaikiri and Ookurikara in the sports festival planned by Tsurumaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 如月 明日もいい日になりますように
February: I Wish Tomorrow Will Be a Good Day, Too
2월 : 내일도 좋은 날이 되기를
Kisaragi: Ashita mo Ii Hi ni Narimasu You ni
episode.summary: A new sword, Juzumaru Tsunetsugu, appears, and Kashuu is made to go along with his training in the mountains. Meanwhile, Honebami Toushirou gets left behind when he is dispatched and ends up in the wrong time period... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 睦月 強くならなきゃ
January: I Must Become Stronger
1월 : 강해져야 해
Mutsuki: Tsuyoku Naranakya
episode.summary: On New Year`s Eve, after Yamatonokami Yasusada leaves the citadel, the Sword Warriors plan to celebrate the new year like humans do. They are joined by new swords Higekiri and Hizamaru from the Minamoto clan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 葉月 このことは秘密だからな
August: So Let`s Keep This a Secret, Okay?
8월 : 이 건 비밀이야
Hazuki: Kono Koto wa Himitsu Dakara na
episode.summary: While Hasebe is away on an expedition, Kikkou Sadamune and Sengo Muramasa compete to see who will take care of Master in his place. Hirano finds Uguisumaru writing about Ookanehira and asks to learn more about the newcomer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 文月 いざ, 大勝負
July: Now, It`s Do-or-Die
7월 : 자, 대승부
Fumizuki: Iza, Ooshoubu
episode.summary: New swords Monoyoshi Sadamune and Houchou Toushirou arrive. As Kashuu shows Monoyoshi around, lucky things happen one after another. Meanwhile, the Awataguchi brothers try to cheer Hakata up with a festival from his hometown. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 水無月 これからもよろしく
June: We`re Counting On You from Now On, Too!
6월 : 앞으로도 잘 부탁해
Minazuki: Kore kara mo Yoroshiku
episode.summary: Sayo Samonji is having nightmares, so his brothers want to plant lavender to help him sleep. And with all the new Sword Warriors arriving, the citadel is getting crowded, so it`s Hakata to the rescue with his buried treasure! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 皐月 俺だから, できること
May: What I Can Do Because I`m Me
5월 : 나이기에 할 수 있는 일
Satsuki: Ore Dakara, Dekiru Koto
episode.summary: Urashima wants his brothers Nagasone and Hachisuka to get along better, so he asks them to cook for him. Meanwhile, Yamanbagiri follows the newly-arrived Sohayanotsurugi to find out how he can be so cheerful even though he`s a copy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師走 花丸な日々の物語
December: Stories of Hanamaru Days
12월 하나마루 같은 날들의 이야기
Shiwasu: Hanamaru na Hibi no Monogatari
episode.summary: Kashuu and the others try to find a way to save the Sword Warriors who are in trouble at Edo Castle... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霜月 期待しているよ
November: I`m Counting on You
11월 : 기대하고 있어
Shimotsuki: Kitai Shite Iru yo
episode.summary: With fall turning to winter, Shinano goes in search of warmth around the citadel. Meanwhile, the History Retrograde Army has been scheming in the Edo period, and Ookurikara leads a team to stop them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神無月 ね, 大丈夫でしょう
October: See, It`s Fine, Right?
10월 : 저기, 괜찮아?
Kannazuki: Ne, Daijoubu Deshou
episode.summary: Houchou goes fishing with Urashima and the others after he arguing with Ichigo Hitofuri, but they end up falling asleep and wake up not knowing where they are... Oodenta is afraid his spiritual power is scaring away the animals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 長月 たまにはいいですね...
September: Sometimes It`s Nice...
9월 : 가끔씩은 좋네...
Nagatsuki: Tama ni wa Ii Desu ne...
episode.summary: Taroutachi, who is tall even for a Sword Warrior, has trouble with his size in his day-to-day life. In the midst of the hot summer, Mutsunokami comes up with a different kind of sparring to help everyone cool down. Source: crunchyroll
